about_the_game:
This is an action casual game, and your computer needs to be equipped with a camera to experience this game.
*Capture your arm trajectory through a camera during the game to collect diamonds that appear in the game.
*When you receive a diamond, you will also receive a fruit platter as a reward.

There are two game modes available in the game:
1. Arcade mode: In this mode, you cannot miss more than three diamonds or touch a bomb, otherwise the game will end.
2. Endless Mode: In this mode, you have 90 seconds to collect as many diamonds as possible and win the most fruit platters.

#So, you don't have to buy expensive motion capture gaming equipment or VR control devices, you only need a regular camera to experience the joy of real-time motion capture games.
@In short, this is a game that can help you release stress and is also very suitable for playing at friends and family gatherings.
Special attention:
1. Please play this game in a well lit environment.
2. Try to aim the camera directly at your entire body.
3. If you want to experience large screen gaming, please connect your computer to the TV for gaming, which will bring you a better gaming experience.
